00056 TopologyInfo::TopologyInfo()
00057 {
00058   memset( dimMap, 0, sizeof(dimMap) );
00059   memset( adjMap, 0, sizeof(adjMap) );
00060   memset( edgeMap, 0, sizeof(edgeMap) );
00061   memset( faceMap, 0, sizeof(faceMap) );
00062   memset( vertAdjMap, 0, sizeof(vertAdjMap) );
00063   memset( shortNames, 0, sizeof(shortNames) );
00064   memset( longNames, 0, sizeof(longNames) );
00065   
00066   longNames[POLYGON]       = long_polygon_name;
00067   longNames[TRIANGLE]      = long_triangle_name;
00068   longNames[QUADRILATERAL] = long_quadrilateral_name;
00069   longNames[POLYHEDRON]    = long_polyhedron_name;
00070   longNames[TETRAHEDRON]   = long_tetrahedron_name;
00071   longNames[HEXAHEDRON]    = long_hexahedron_name;
00072   longNames[PRISM]         = long_prism_name;
00073   longNames[PYRAMID]       = long_pyramid_name;
00074   longNames[SEPTAHEDRON]   = long_septahedron_name;
00075   
00076   shortNames[POLYGON]       = short_polygon_name;
00077   shortNames[TRIANGLE]      = short_triangle_name;
00078   shortNames[QUADRILATERAL] = short_quadrilateral_name;
00079   shortNames[POLYHEDRON]    = short_polyhedron_name;
00080   shortNames[TETRAHEDRON]   = short_tetrahedron_name;
00081   shortNames[HEXAHEDRON]    = short_hexahedron_name;
00082   shortNames[PRISM]         = short_prism_name;
00083   shortNames[PYRAMID]       = short_pyramid_name;
00084   shortNames[SEPTAHEDRON]   = short_septahedron_name;
00085   
00086   dimMap[POLYGON ]      = 2;
00087   dimMap[TRIANGLE]      = 2;
00088   dimMap[QUADRILATERAL] = 2;
00089   dimMap[POLYHEDRON]    = 3;
00090   dimMap[TETRAHEDRON]   = 3;
00091   dimMap[HEXAHEDRON]    = 3;
00092   dimMap[PRISM]         = 3;
00093   dimMap[PYRAMID]       = 3;
00094   dimMap[SEPTAHEDRON]   = 3;
00095   
00096   adjMap[TRIANGLE][0] = 3;
00097   adjMap[TRIANGLE][1] = 3;
00098   adjMap[TRIANGLE][2] = 1;
00099   adjMap[TRIANGLE][3] = 0;
00100   
00101   adjMap[QUADRILATERAL][0] = 4;
00102   adjMap[QUADRILATERAL][1] = 4;
00103   adjMap[QUADRILATERAL][2] = 1;
00104   adjMap[QUADRILATERAL][3] = 0;
00105   
00106   adjMap[TETRAHEDRON][0] = 4;
00107   adjMap[TETRAHEDRON][1] = 6;
00108   adjMap[TETRAHEDRON][2] = 4;
00109   adjMap[TETRAHEDRON][3] = 1;
00110   
00111   adjMap[HEXAHEDRON][0] = 8;
00112   adjMap[HEXAHEDRON][1] = 12;
00113   adjMap[HEXAHEDRON][2] = 6;
00114   adjMap[HEXAHEDRON][3] = 1;
00115   
00116   adjMap[PRISM][0] = 6;
00117   adjMap[PRISM][1] = 9;
00118   adjMap[PRISM][2] = 5;
00119   adjMap[PRISM][3] = 1;
00120   
00121   adjMap[PYRAMID][0] = 5;
00122   adjMap[PYRAMID][1] = 8;
00123   adjMap[PYRAMID][2] = 5;
00124   adjMap[PYRAMID][3] = 1;
00125   
00126   adjMap[SEPTAHEDRON][0] = 7;
00127   adjMap[SEPTAHEDRON][1] = 11;
00128   adjMap[SEPTAHEDRON][2] = 6;  /* See description in TSTT mesh interface doc */
00129   adjMap[SEPTAHEDRON][3] = 1;
00130 
00131   int side;
00132   for (side = 0; side < 3; ++side)
00133   {
00134     edgeMap[TRIANGLE-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side;
00135     edgeMap[TRIANGLE-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = (side+1)%3;
00136   }
00137   for (side = 0; side < 4; ++side)
00138   {
00139     edgeMap[QUADRILATERAL-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side;
00140     edgeMap[QUADRILATERAL-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = (side+1)%4;
00141   }
00142   for (side = 0; side < 3; ++side)
00143   {
00144     edgeMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side;
00145     edgeMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = (side+1)%3;
00146   }
00147   for (side = 3; side < 6; ++side)
00148   {
00149     edgeMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side -3 ;
00150     edgeMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = 3;
00151   }
00152   for (side = 0; side < 4; ++side)
00153   {
00154     edgeMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side;
00155     edgeMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = (side+1)%4;
00156   }
00157   for (side = 4; side < 8; ++side)
00158   {
00159     edgeMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side - 4;
00160     edgeMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = side;
00161   }
00162   for (side = 8; side < 12; ++side)
00163   {
00164     edgeMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side - 4;
00165     edgeMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = 4+(side+1)%4;
00166   }
00167   for (side = 0; side < 3; ++side)
00168   {
00169     edgeMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side;
00170     edgeMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = (side+1)%3;
00171   }
00172   for (side = 3; side < 6; ++side)
00173   {
00174     edgeMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side - 3;
00175     edgeMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = side;
00176   }
00177   for (side = 6; side < 9; ++side)
00178   {
00179     edgeMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side-3;
00180     edgeMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = 3+(side+1)%3;
00181   }
00182   for (side = 0; side < 4; ++side)
00183   {
00184     edgeMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side;
00185     edgeMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = (side+1)%4;
00186   }
00187   for (side = 4; side < 8; ++side)
00188   {
00189     edgeMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_FACE][side][0] = side - 4;
00190     edgeMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_FACE][side][1] = 4;
00191   }
00192   
00193   for (side = 0; side < 3; ++side)
00194   {
00195     faceMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][side][0] = 3;
00196     faceMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][side][1] = side;
00197     faceMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][side][2] = (side+1)%3;
00198     faceMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][side][3] = 3;
00199   }
00200   faceMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][3][0] = 3;
00201   faceMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][3][1] = 2;
00202   faceMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][3][2] = 1;
00203   faceMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][3][3] = 0;
00204 
00205   for (side = 0; side < 4; ++side)
00206   {
00207     faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][side][0] = 4;
00208     faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][side][1] = side;
00209     faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][side][2] = (side+1)%4;
00210     faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][side][3] = 4+(side+1)%4;
00211     faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][side][4] = side + 4;
00212   }
00213   faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][4][0] = 4;
00214   faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][4][1] = 3;
00215   faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][4][2] = 2;
00216   faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][4][3] = 1;
00217   faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][4][4] = 0;
00218   faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][5][0] = 4;
00219   faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][5][1] = 4;
00220   faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][5][2] = 5;
00221   faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][5][3] = 6;
00222   faceMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_VOL][5][4] = 7;
00223   
00224   for (side = 0; side < 4; ++side)
00225   {
00226     faceMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_VOL][side][0] = 3;
00227     faceMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_VOL][side][1] = side;
00228     faceMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_VOL][side][2] = (side+1)%4;
00229     faceMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_VOL][side][3] = 4;
00230   }
00231   faceMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_VOL][4][0] = 4;
00232   faceMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_VOL][4][1] = 3;
00233   faceMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_VOL][4][2] = 2;
00234   faceMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_VOL][4][3] = 1;
00235   faceMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_VOL][4][4] = 0;
00236 
00237   for (side = 0; side < 3; ++side)
00238   {
00239     faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][side][0] = 4;
00240     faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][side][1] = side;
00241     faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][side][2] = (side+1)%3;
00242     faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][side][3] = 3+(side+1)%3;
00243     faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][side][4] = side + 3;
00244   }
00245   faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][3][0] = 3;
00246   faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][3][1] = 2;
00247   faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][3][2] = 1;
00248   faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][3][3] = 0;
00249   faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][4][0] = 3;
00250   faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][4][1] = 3;
00251   faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][4][2] = 4;
00252   faceMap[PRISM-FIRST_VOL][4][3] = 5;
00253   
00254   int i;
00255   for (i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00256   {
00257     vertAdjMap[TRIANGLE-FIRST_FACE][i][0] = 2;
00258     vertAdjMap[TRIANGLE-FIRST_FACE][i][1] = (i+1)%3;
00259     vertAdjMap[TRIANGLE-FIRST_FACE][i][2] = (i+2)%3;
00260   }
00261   
00262   for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
00263   {
00264     vertAdjMap[QUADRILATERAL-FIRST_FACE][i][0] = 2;
00265     vertAdjMap[QUADRILATERAL-FIRST_FACE][i][1] = (i+1)%4;
00266     vertAdjMap[QUADRILATERAL-FIRST_FACE][i][2] = (i+3)%4;
00267   }
00268   
00269   
00270   unsigned tet_corner_data[] = { 1, 2, 3, 
00271                                  0, 3, 2,
00272                                  3, 0, 1,
00273                                  2, 1, 0 };
00274   for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
00275   {
00276     vertAdjMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][i][0] = 3;
00277     for (unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j)
00278       vertAdjMap[TETRAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][i][j+1] = tet_corner_data[3*i+j];
00279   }
00280   
00281   for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
00282   {
00283     vertAdjMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_FACE][i][0] = 3;
00284     vertAdjMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_FACE][i][1] = (i+1)%4;
00285     vertAdjMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_FACE][i][2] = (i+3)%4;
00286     vertAdjMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_FACE][i][3] = 4;
00287   }
00288   vertAdjMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_FACE][4][0] = 4;
00289   for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00290     vertAdjMap[PYRAMID-FIRST_FACE][4][i+1] = 3 - i;
00291   
00292   for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
00293   {
00294     vertAdjMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][i][0] = 3;
00295     vertAdjMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][i][1] = (i+1)%4;
00296     vertAdjMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][i][2] = (i+3)%4;
00297     vertAdjMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][i][3] = i+4;
00298   }
00299   for (i = 4; i < 8; ++i)
00300   {
00301     vertAdjMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][i][0] = 3;
00302     vertAdjMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][i][1] = (i+3)%4+4;
00303     vertAdjMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][i][2] = (i+1)%4+4;
00304     vertAdjMap[HEXAHEDRON-FIRST_FACE][i][3] = i-4;
00305   }
00306   
00307   for (i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00308   {
00309     vertAdjMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][i][0] = 3;
00310     vertAdjMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][i][1] = (i+1)%3;
00311     vertAdjMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][i][2] = (i+2)%3;
00312     vertAdjMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][i][3] = i+3;
00313   }
00314   for (i = 3; i < 6; ++i)
00315   {
00316     vertAdjMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][i][0] = 3;
00317     vertAdjMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][i][1] = (i+2)%3+3;
00318     vertAdjMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][i][2] = (i+1)%3+3;
00319     vertAdjMap[PRISM-FIRST_FACE][i][3] = i-3;
00320   }
00321   
00322     // Build reverse vertex-vertex adjacency index map
00323   const EntityTopology types[] = { TRIANGLE, 
00324                                    QUADRILATERAL, 
00325                                    TETRAHEDRON,
00326                                    PYRAMID,
00327                                    PRISM, 
00328                                    HEXAHEDRON };
00329   const int num_types = sizeof(types)/sizeof(types[0]);
00330   for (i = 0; i < num_types; ++i)
00331   {
00332     const unsigned num_vert = corners( types[i] );
00333     for (unsigned v = 0; v < num_vert; ++v)
00334     {
00335       unsigned num_v_adj;
00336       const unsigned* v_adj = adjacent_vertices( types[i], v, num_v_adj );
00337       unsigned* reverse = revVertAdjIdx[types[i]-FIRST_FACE][v];
00338       reverse[0] = num_v_adj;
00339       
00340       for (unsigned j = 0; j < num_v_adj; ++j)
00341       {
00342         unsigned num_j_adj, k;
00343         const unsigned* j_adj = adjacent_vertices( types[i], v_adj[j], num_j_adj );
00344         for (k = 0; k < num_j_adj && j_adj[k] != v; ++k);
00345         assert( k < num_j_adj ); // If this fails, vertAdjMap is corrupt!
00346         reverse[j+1] = k;
00347       }
00348     }
00349   }
00350 }
00351 
00352 void TopologyInfo::higher_order( EntityTopology topo,
00353                                      unsigned num_nodes,
00354                                      bool& midedge,
00355                                      bool& midface,
00356                                      bool& midvol,
00357                                      MsqError& err )
00358 {
00359   int ho = higher_order( topo, num_nodes, err );
00360   midedge = (bool)( (ho & (1<<1)) >> 1);
00361   midface = (bool)( (ho & (1<<2)) >> 2);
00362   midvol  = (bool)( (ho & (1<<3)) >> 3);
00363 }
00364 
00365 
00366 int TopologyInfo::higher_order( EntityTopology topo, 
00367                                 unsigned num_nodes, 
00368                                 MsqError& err )
00369 {
00370   int result = 0;
00371   if (topo >= MIXED || num_nodes < instance.adjMap[topo][0])
00372   {
00373     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid element topology", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00374     return 0;
00375   }
00376   
00377   unsigned dim = instance.dimMap[topo];
00378   assert( num_nodes >= instance.adjMap[topo][0] );
00379   unsigned nodes = num_nodes - instance.adjMap[topo][0];
00380   unsigned edges = instance.adjMap[topo][1];
00381   unsigned faces = instance.adjMap[topo][2];
00382   if (edges && nodes >= edges)
00383   {
00384     nodes -= edges;
00385     result |= 1<<1;
00386   }
00387   if (faces && nodes >= faces)
00388   {
00389     nodes -= faces;
00390     result |= 1<<2;
00391   }
00392   if (1 == nodes)
00393   {
00394     if (2 == dim)
00395     {
00396       nodes -= 1;
00397       result |= 1<<2;
00398     }
00399     else if(3 == dim)
00400     {
00401       nodes -= 1;
00402       result |= 1<<3;
00403     }
00404   }
00405   
00406   if (nodes)
00407   {
00408     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid element topology", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00409   }
00410   
00411   return result;
00412 }
00413       
00414 int TopologyInfo::higher_order_from_side( EntityTopology topo,
00415                                           unsigned num_nodes,
00416                                           unsigned side_dimension,
00417                                           unsigned side_number,
00418                                           MsqError& err )
00419 {
00420   bool mids[4] = { true };
00421   higher_order( topo, num_nodes, mids[1], mids[2], mids[3], err );
00422   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00423   
00424   if (side_dimension > dimension(topo) || 
00425       side_number > adjacent(topo, side_dimension)) {
00426     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG,"Invalid side number: %u\n", side_number );
00427     return 0;
00428   }
00429   
00430   if (!mids[side_dimension])
00431     return -1;
00432   
00433   int result = side_number;
00434   switch (side_dimension) {
00435     case 3: if (mids[2]) result += faces(topo);
00436     case 2: if (mids[1]) result += edges(topo);
00437     case 1: result += corners(topo);
00438     case 0: break;
00439     default: 
00440       MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG,"Invalid dimension: %u\n", side_dimension );
00441       return 0;
00442   }
00443   return result;
00444 }
00445 
00446 void TopologyInfo::side_from_higher_order( EntityTopology topo,
00447                                            unsigned num_nodes,
00448                                            unsigned node_number,
00449                                            unsigned& side_dim_out,
00450                                            unsigned& side_num_out,
00451                                            MsqError& err )
00452 {
00453   bool midedge, midface, midvol;
00454   higher_order( topo, num_nodes, midedge, midface, midvol, err );
00455   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00456   side_num_out = node_number;
00457   
00458   if (side_num_out < corners(topo)) {
00459     side_dim_out = 0;
00460     return;
00461   }
00462   side_num_out -= corners(topo);
00463   
00464   if (midedge) {
00465     if (side_num_out < edges(topo)) {
00466       side_dim_out = 1;
00467       return;
00468     }
00469     side_num_out -= edges(topo);
00470   }
00471   
00472   if (midface) {
00473     if (side_num_out < faces(topo)) {
00474       side_dim_out = 2;
00475       return;
00476     }
00477     side_num_out -= faces(topo);
00478   }
00479   
00480   if (midvol && side_num_out == 0) {
00481     side_dim_out = 3;
00482     return;
00483   }
00484   
00485   MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG,"Invalid node index\n");
00486 }
00487 
00488 const unsigned*  TopologyInfo::edge_vertices( EntityTopology topo,
00489                                               unsigned edge, 
00490                                               MsqError& err)
00491 {
00492   if (topo < (EntityTopology)FIRST_FACE || 
00493       topo > (EntityTopology)LAST_VOL || 
00494       edge >= edges( topo ) )
00495   {
00496     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00497     topo = (EntityTopology)FIRST_FACE;
00498     edge = 0;
00499   }
00500   
00501   return instance.edgeMap[topo-FIRST_FACE][edge];
00502 }
00503 
00504 const unsigned*  TopologyInfo::edge_vertices( EntityTopology topo,
00505                                               unsigned edge )
00506 {
00507   if (topo < (EntityTopology)FIRST_FACE || 
00508       topo > (EntityTopology)LAST_VOL || 
00509       edge >= edges( topo ) )
00510   {
00511     return 0;
00512   }
00513   return instance.edgeMap[topo-FIRST_FACE][edge];
00514 }
00515 
00516 const unsigned* TopologyInfo::face_vertices( EntityTopology topo,
00517                                              unsigned face,
00518                                              unsigned& length,
00519                                              MsqError& err )
00520 {
00521   if (topo < (EntityTopology)FIRST_VOL || 
00522       topo > (EntityTopology)LAST_VOL || 
00523       face >= faces( topo ) )
00524   {
00525     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00526     topo = (EntityTopology)FIRST_VOL;
00527     face = 0;
00528   }
00529   
00530   length = instance.faceMap[topo-FIRST_VOL][face][0];
00531   return instance.faceMap[topo-FIRST_VOL][face] + 1;
00532 }
00533 const unsigned* TopologyInfo::face_vertices( EntityTopology topo,
00534                                              unsigned face,
00535                                              unsigned& length )
00536 {
00537   if (topo < (EntityTopology)FIRST_VOL || 
00538       topo > (EntityTopology)LAST_VOL || 
00539       face >= faces( topo ) )
00540   {
00541     return 0;
00542   }
00543   
00544   length = instance.faceMap[topo-FIRST_VOL][face][0];
00545   return instance.faceMap[topo-FIRST_VOL][face] + 1;
00546 }
00547 
00548 
00549 
00550 
00551 const unsigned* TopologyInfo::side_vertices( EntityTopology topo,
00552                                              unsigned dim,
00553                                              unsigned side,
00554                                              unsigned& count_out,
00555                                              MsqError& err )
00556 {
00557   static const unsigned all[] = { 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 };
00558   const unsigned* result;
00559   
00560   if (dim != 0 && dim == dimension(topo))
00561   {
00562     count_out = corners( topo );
00563     result = all;
00564   }
00565   else if (dim == 1)
00566   {
00567     count_out = 2;
00568     result = edge_vertices( topo, side, err );
00569   }
00570   else if( dim == 2)
00571   {
00572     result = face_vertices( topo, side, count_out, err );
00573   } 
00574   else
00575   {
00576     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00577     count_out = 0;
00578     result = 0;
00579   }    
00580   return result;
00581 }
00582 const unsigned* TopologyInfo::side_vertices( EntityTopology topo,
00583                                              unsigned dim,
00584                                              unsigned side,
00585                                              unsigned& count_out  )
00586 {
00587   static const unsigned all[] = { 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 };
00588   const unsigned* result;
00589   
00590   if (dim != 0 && dim == dimension(topo))
00591   {
00592     count_out = corners( topo );
00593     result = all;
00594   }
00595   else if (dim == 1)
00596   {
00597     count_out = 2;
00598     result = edge_vertices( topo, side );
00599   }
00600   else if( dim == 2)
00601   {
00602     result = face_vertices( topo, side, count_out );
00603   } 
00604   else
00605   {
00606     result = 0;
00607   }    
00608   return result;
00609 }
00610       
00611 
00612 
00613 void TopologyInfo::side_number( EntityTopology topo,
00614                                     unsigned num_nodes,
00615                                     unsigned node_index,
00616                                     unsigned& side_dim_out,
00617                                     unsigned& side_num_out,
00618                                     MsqError& err )
00619 {
00620   if (topo >= (EntityTopology)MIXED || num_nodes < instance.adjMap[topo][0])
00621   {
00622     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid element topology", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00623     return;
00624   }
00625   
00626   unsigned nodes = instance.adjMap[topo][0];
00627   unsigned edges = instance.adjMap[topo][1];
00628   unsigned faces = instance.adjMap[topo][2];
00629   side_num_out = node_index;
00630 
00631   if (side_num_out < nodes)
00632   {
00633     side_dim_out = 0;
00634     return;
00635   }
00636   num_nodes -= nodes;
00637   side_num_out -= nodes;
00638   
00639   if (edges && num_nodes >= edges)
00640   {
00641     if (side_num_out < edges)
00642     {
00643       side_dim_out = 1;
00644       return;
00645     }
00646     num_nodes -= edges;
00647     side_num_out -= edges;
00648   }
00649   if (faces && num_nodes >= faces)
00650   {
00651     if (side_num_out < faces)
00652     {
00653       side_dim_out = 2;
00654       return;
00655     }
00656     num_nodes -= faces;
00657     side_num_out -= faces;
00658   }
00659   if (side_num_out == 0)
00660   {
00661     side_dim_out = instance.dimMap[topo];
00662     side_num_out = 0;
00663     return;
00664   }
00665   
00666   MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00667 }
00668   
00669   
00670 
00671 const unsigned* TopologyInfo::adjacent_vertices( EntityTopology topo,
00672                                               unsigned index,
00673                                               unsigned& num_adj_out )
00674 {
00675   const unsigned count = corners( topo );
00676   if (!count || index >= count)
00677   {
00678     num_adj_out = 0;
00679     return 0;
00680   }
00681   
00682   const unsigned* vect = instance.vertAdjMap[topo-FIRST_FACE][index];
00683   num_adj_out = vect[0];
00684   return vect + 1;
00685 }
00686 
00687 const unsigned* TopologyInfo::reverse_vertex_adjacency_offsets(
00688                                               EntityTopology topo,
00689                                               unsigned index,
00690                                               unsigned& num_adj_out )
00691 {
00692   const unsigned count = corners( topo );
00693   if (!count || index >= count)
00694   {
00695     num_adj_out = 0;
00696     return 0;
00697   }
00698   
00699   const unsigned* vect = instance.revVertAdjIdx[topo-FIRST_FACE][index];
00700   num_adj_out = vect[0];
00701   return vect + 1;
00702 }
00703 
00704 bool TopologyInfo::compare_sides( const size_t* verts1,
00705                                EntityTopology type1,
00706                                unsigned side1,
00707                                const size_t* verts2,
00708                                EntityTopology type2,
00709                                unsigned side2,
00710                                unsigned side_dim,
00711                                MsqError& err )
00712 {
00713   const unsigned *conn1, *conn2;
00714   unsigned len1, len2;
00715   
00716   conn1 = side_vertices( type1, side_dim, side1, len1, err );
00717   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00718   conn2 = side_vertices( type2, side_dim, side2, len2, err );
00719   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00720   
00721     // obviously not the same if different number of vertices
00722     // (triangular face cannot match quadrilateral face)
00723   if (len1 != len2)
00724     return false;
00725   
00726     // Find location (i) in vertices of side of second element
00727     // that matches the first vertex in the side of the first 
00728     // element.
00729   unsigned i, j;
00730   for (i = 0; i < len2; ++i)
00731     if (verts1[conn1[0]] == verts2[conn2[i]])
00732       break;
00733     // If not found, then no match
00734   if (i == len2)
00735     return false;
00736   
00737     // Try comparing side connectivity in forward order
00738   for (j = 1; j < len1; ++j)
00739     if (verts1[conn1[j]] != verts2[conn2[(i+j)%len2]])
00740       break;
00741     // If they match, we're done
00742   if (j == len1)
00743     return true;
00744   
00745     // Try comparing in reverse order
00746   for (j = 1; j < len1; ++j)
00747     if (verts1[conn1[j]] != verts2[conn2[(i+len2-j)%len2]])
00748       return false;
00749     // If here, matched in reverse order
00750   return true;
00751 }
00752 
00753 unsigned TopologyInfo::find_edge( EntityTopology topo,
00754                                   const unsigned* side_vertices,
00755                                   bool& reversed_out,
00756                                   MsqError& err )
00757 {
00758   if (dimension(topo) <= 1) {
00759     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG,"Invalid element dimension");
00760     return (unsigned)-1;
00761   }
00762 
00763   for (unsigned i = 0; i < edges(topo); ++i) {
00764     const unsigned* edge = edge_vertices( topo, i, err );
00765     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00766 
00767     if (edge[0] == side_vertices[0] &&
00768         edge[1] == side_vertices[1]) {
00769       reversed_out = false;
00770       return i;
00771     }
00772 
00773     if (edge[0] == side_vertices[1] &&
00774         edge[1] == side_vertices[0]) {
00775       reversed_out = true;
00776       return i;
00777     }
00778   }
00779   
00780   MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG,"No such edge");
00781   return (unsigned)-1;
00782 }
00783 
00784 unsigned TopologyInfo::find_face( EntityTopology topo,
00785                                   const unsigned* side_vertices,
00786                                   unsigned num_vertices,
00787                                   bool& reversed_out,
00788                                   MsqError& err )
00789 {
00790   if (dimension(topo) <= 2) {
00791     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG,"Invalid element dimension");
00792     return (unsigned)-1;
00793   }
00794 
00795   for (unsigned i = 0; i < faces(topo); ++i) {
00796     unsigned j, n, offset;
00797     const unsigned* face = face_vertices( topo, i, n, err );
00798     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00799     if (n != num_vertices)
00800       continue;
00801 
00802     for (offset = 0; offset < num_vertices; ++offset)
00803       if (face[offset] == side_vertices[0])
00804         break;
00805     if (offset == num_vertices)
00806       continue;
00807 
00808     for (j = 1; j < num_vertices; ++j)
00809       if (side_vertices[j] != face[(offset + j)%num_vertices])
00810         break;
00811     if (j == num_vertices) {
00812       reversed_out = false;
00813       return i;
00814     }
00815 
00816     for (j = 1; j < num_vertices; ++j)
00817       if (side_vertices[j] != face[(offset + num_vertices - j)%num_vertices])
00818         break;
00819     if (j == num_vertices) {
00820       reversed_out = true;
00821       return i;
00822     }
00823   }
00824   
00825   MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG,"No such face");
00826   return (unsigned)-1;
00827 }
00828 
00829 
00830 void TopologyInfo::find_side( EntityTopology topo, 
00831                               const unsigned* side_vertices,
00832                               unsigned num_vertices,
00833                               unsigned& dimension_out,
00834                               unsigned& number_out,
00835                               bool& reversed_out,
00836                               MsqError& err )
00837 {
00838   switch (num_vertices) {
00839   case 1:
00840     dimension_out = 0;
00841     number_out = *side_vertices;
00842     reversed_out = false;
00843     if (*side_vertices >= corners(topo)) 
00844       MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG,"Invalid corner number: %u\n", *side_vertices);
00845     break;
00846   case 2:
00847     dimension_out = 1;
00848     number_out = find_edge( topo, side_vertices, reversed_out, err );
00849     MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00850     break;
00851   case 3:
00852   case 4:
00853     dimension_out = 2;
00854     number_out = find_face( topo, side_vertices, num_vertices, reversed_out, err );
00855     MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00856     break;
00857   default:
00858     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT, "Invalid number of side vertices: %u\n", num_vertices );
00859     break;
00860   }
00861 }
00862
